Key Match Events: Despodov scored the winning goal for Bulgaria in the 40th minute
Ahmedov scored for Bulgaria in the 78th minute
Nurnberger scored for Bulgaria in the 90+1 minute
Kolev scored for Bulgaria in the 90+3 minute
Charles, McNair, Bradley, and Hume were given yellow cards for Northern Ireland
Pre-Game Insights: Bulgaria and Northern Ireland both had an unbeaten start to Group C3
Michael O'Neill needed time to improve the belief within the Northern Ireland ranks
Bulgaria have made a habit of posting draws under their manager, Ilian Iliev
Northern Ireland have a 1-0 triumph over Scotland at Hampden Park in March as evidence they can overcome teams at this level
Bulgaria will be without Filip Krastev after he was sent off for two yellow cards on Thursday
Ivan Minchev is in line to replace Krastev in the starting lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended with a 1-0 score in favor of Bulgaria
The match was played at the Stadion Hristo Botev in Bulgaria
The match was part of the UEFA Nations League Group C3
